TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProtectionLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the security services requested for an authenticated stream.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates creating and using a client-side <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
[!code-cs[NclNegoSyncClient#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.net.security.pr_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[NclNegoSyncClient#0](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.net.security.pr_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel EncryptAndSign = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Encrypt and sign data to help ensure the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel Sign = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Sign data to help ensure the integrity of transmitted data.
